meanings.definition: A type of oil extracted from the seeds of the gingelli plant.
meanings.sent1: I used gingelli to cook my favorite dish.
meanings.sent2: The gingelli oil added a delicious flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The gingelli oil slipped out of the bottle and onto the counter.
meanings.sent4: Her hair glistened like gingelli oil in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of gingelli filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A small tree native to India and Sri Lanka, also known as the sesame tree.
meanings.sent1: The gingelli tree provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: We sat under the gingelli tree and enjoyed a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The gingelli tree waved its branches in the breeze, as if saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The gingelli tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the gingelli tree rustled softly in the wind.

meanings.definition: The seeds of the gingelli plant, used in cooking and for their oil.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled gingelli seeds on top of the salad.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of roasted gingelli seeds filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The gingelli seeds rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like gingelli seeds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of gingelli seeds added a delightful texture to the dish.
